_title: SCHUNK EZU 3-finger centric gripper product datasheet

properties.dcterms:title: SCHUNK EZU 3-finger centric gripper product datasheet
properties.dcterms:description: Detailed technical specifications, features, and integration options for the SCHUNK EZU series of 3-finger centric grippers designed for industrial automation.
properties.dcat:keyword: centric gripper, industrial automation, robotics, gripping force, PROFINET, EtherCAT, Modbus RTU, automotive production
